name: orch-stubs
description: Performance and scaling stubs owned by Orchestration

scripts.build: (trap 'kill 0' INT; npm run build:auth & npm run build:ipv & npm run build:spot & wait)
scripts.check: npm run check:lint && npm run check:prettier
scripts.fix: npm run fix:lint && npm run fix:prettier
scripts.test:localstack:integration: npm run localstack:up && (jest --config=./jest.config.integration.ts && e=0) || e=1 && npm run localstack:down && exit $e
scripts.test:ci: tsc --noEmit && npm run localstack:up && (jest --config=./jest.config.ci.ts --runInBand && e=0) || e=1 && npm run localstack:down && exit $e
